attributes.additional_details:
I have a 9 month old xl bully and I have 4 children and he is the biggest softy going!
He has the best bond with my children and a family dog
As of many bully breeds. It isn’t the dog it’s the owners that own them that cannot control them or be bothered to train them! That should have there’s took!
This isn’t fair on people who have a loving family dog to have them took because of the back street people who train there’s to attack and not have a mussel on
attributes.background:
Not to ban xl bully’s! 
To make people have a license for one 
If you don’t have a license then you don’t have the dog. Because the people who just have them to attack won’t pay for one

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same/a similar action:  https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643611
